fields.summary: EC2 many security groups / rules too slow

comments.body:
Indexes are added for:

* metadata_network_rule_ip_ranges.networkrule_id
* metadata_network_group_rule_peers.networkrule_id
* metadata_network_rule.metadata_network_group_rule_fk

These indexes should be present on clean installs and added on upgrade to 4.2.

Fix verified.

Prior to upgrade:


{code:java}
[root@d-23 ~]# psql -p 8777 -h /var/lib/eucalyptus/db/data eucalyptus_shared

eucalyptus_shared=# select column_name, data_type, character_maximum_length
from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS where table_name = 'metadata_network_group_rule_peers';
               column_name                |     data_type     | character_maximum_length 
------------------------------------------+-------------------+--------------------------
 networkrule_id                           | character varying |                      255
 network_rule_peer_network_group_id       | character varying |                      255
 network_rule_peer_network_user_group     | character varying |                      255
 network_rule_peer_network_user_query_key | character varying |                      255
(4 rows)

eucalyptus_shared=# select * from pg_indexes where tablename = 'metadata_network_group_rule_peers';
 schemaname | tablename | indexname | tablespace | indexdef 
------------+-----------+-----------+------------+----------
(0 rows)

eucalyptus_shared=# select column_name, data_type, character_maximum_length
from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS where table_name = 'metadata_network_rule';
              column_name              |          data_type          | character_maximum_length 
---------------------------------------+-----------------------------+--------------------------
 id                                    | character varying           |                      255
 creation_timestamp                    | timestamp without time zone |                         
 last_update_timestamp                 | timestamp without time zone |                         
 metadata_perm_uuid                    | character varying           |                      255
 version                               | integer                     |                         
 metadata_network_rule_egress          | boolean                     |                         
 metadata_network_rule_high_port       | integer                     |                         
 metadata_network_rule_low_port        | integer                     |                         
 metadata_network_rule_protocol        | character varying           |                      255
 metadata_network_rule_protocol_number | integer                     |                         
 metadata_network_group_rule_fk        | character varying           |                      255
(11 rows)

eucalyptus_shared=# select * from pg_indexes where tablename = 'metadata_network_rule';
    schemaname    |       tablename       |          indexname           | tablespace |                                 
                         indexdef                                                           
------------------+-----------------------+------------------------------+------------+---------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 eucalyptus_cloud | metadata_network_rule | uk_motcmht10ptq0vngyryc1ih78 |            | CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uk_motcmht10
ptq0vngyryc1ih78 ON eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_network_rule USING btree (metadata_perm_uuid)
 eucalyptus_cloud | metadata_network_rule | uk_m535vp5ue7s7ubo043jx8eg3b |            | CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uk_m535vp5ue
7s7ubo043jx8eg3b ON eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_network_rule USING btree (metadata_perm_uuid)
 eucalyptus_cloud | metadata_network_rule | metadata_network_rule_pkey   |            | CREATE UNIQUE INDEX metadata_net
work_rule_pkey ON eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_network_rule USING btree (id)
(3 rows)
{code}

After upgrade:

{code:java}
eucalyptus_shared=# select column_name, data_type, character_maximum_length
eucalyptus_shared-# from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS where table_name = 'metadata_network_group_rule_peers';
               column_name                |     data_type     | character_maximum_length 
------------------------------------------+-------------------+--------------------------
 networkrule_id                           | character varying |                      255
 network_rule_peer_network_group_id       | character varying |                      255
 network_rule_peer_network_user_group     | character varying |                      255
 network_rule_peer_network_user_query_key | character varying |                      255
(4 rows)

eucalyptus_shared=# select * from pg_indexes where tablename = 'metadata_network_group_rule_peers';
    schemaname    |             tablename             |            indexname             | tablespace |                 
                                            indexdef                                                             
------------------+-----------------------------------+----------------------------------+------------+-----------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 eucalyptus_cloud | metadata_network_group_rule_peers | metadata_group_peers_rule_id_idx |            | CREATE INDEX met
adata_group_peers_rule_id_idx ON eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_network_group_rule_peers USING btree (networkrule_id)
(1 row)

eucalyptus_shared=# select column_name, data_type, character_maximum_length
eucalyptus_shared-# from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS where table_name = 'metadata_network_rule';
              column_name              |          data_type          | character_maximum_length 
---------------------------------------+-----------------------------+--------------------------
 id                                    | character varying           |                      255
 creation_timestamp                    | timestamp without time zone |                         
 last_update_timestamp                 | timestamp without time zone |                         
 metadata_perm_uuid                    | character varying           |                      255
 version                               | integer                     |                         
 metadata_network_rule_egress          | boolean                     |                         
 metadata_network_rule_high_port       | integer                     |                         
 metadata_network_rule_low_port        | integer                     |                         
 metadata_network_rule_protocol        | character varying           |                      255
 metadata_network_rule_protocol_number | integer                     |                         
 metadata_network_group_rule_fk        | character varying           |                      255
(11 rows)

eucalyptus_shared=# select * from pg_indexes where tablename = 'metadata_network_rule';
    schemaname    |       tablename       |             indexname              | tablespace |                           
                                     indexdef                                                                
------------------+-----------------------+------------------------------------+------------+---------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 eucalyptus_cloud | metadata_network_rule | metadata_network_group_rule_fk_idx |            | CREATE INDEX metadata_netw
ork_group_rule_fk_idx ON eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_network_rule USING btree (metadata_network_group_rule_fk)
 eucalyptus_cloud | metadata_network_rule | uk_motcmht10ptq0vngyryc1ih78       |            | CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uk_mot
cmht10ptq0vngyryc1ih78 ON eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_network_rule USING btree (metadata_perm_uuid)
 eucalyptus_cloud | metadata_network_rule | uk_m535vp5ue7s7ubo043jx8eg3b       |            | CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uk_m53
5vp5ue7s7ubo043jx8eg3b ON eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_network_rule USING btree (metadata_perm_uuid)
 eucalyptus_cloud | metadata_network_rule | metadata_network_rule_pkey         |            | CREATE UNIQUE INDEX metada
ta_network_rule_pkey ON eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_network_rule USING btree (id)
(4 rows)

eucalyptus_shared=# select column_name, data_type, character_maximum_length
from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS where table_name = 'metadata_network_rule_ip_ranges';
  column_name   |     data_type     | character_maximum_length 
----------------+-------------------+--------------------------
 networkrule_id | character varying |                      255
 ipranges       | character varying |                      255
(2 rows)

eucalyptus_shared=# select * from pg_indexes where tablename = 'metadata_network_rule_ip_ranges';
    schemaname    |            tablename            |           indexname            | tablespace |                     
                                      indexdef                                                           
------------------+---------------------------------+--------------------------------+------------+---------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 eucalyptus_cloud | metadata_network_rule_ip_ranges | metadata_group_ips_rule_id_idx |            | CREATE INDEX metadat
a_group_ips_rule_id_idx ON eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_network_rule_ip_ranges USING btree (networkrule_id)
(1 row)
{code}
